thread.title: MOVES-Sridhar Iyer to head customer franchise at Citibank India - Yahoo Finance
thread.title_full: MOVES-Sridhar Iyer to head customer franchise at Citibank India - Yahoo Finance

author: yahoo
title: MOVES-Sridhar Iyer to head customer franchise at Citibank India - Yahoo Finance
text:
Oct 23 (Reuters) - Citigroup Inc's unit, Citibank India, appointed Sridhar Iyer head of customer franchise.
Iyer, who will also remain the head of digital banking and innovation, joined Citibank in 1996.
He has 20 years of consumer banking experience across Asia and Europe.
(Reporting by Sruthi Shankar in Bengaluru)
Singapore International News Citibank India Citigroup Inc
